info.description: API for fire recovery analysis tools including fire severity analysis, boundary refinement, and vegetation impact assessment
info.title: Fire Recovery Backend

schema.title: Response Cache Test Cache Test Get

get.description:
Health check endpoint using command pattern.

This endpoint demonstrates the command pattern for a simple operation
and serves as a template for other endpoints.

post.description: Analyze fire severity using remote sensing data.
Refine the fire boundary to the provided GeoJSON.
Resolve fire severity against vegetation map to create a matrix of affected areas.

get.description: Get the result of the fire severity analysis.

schema.title: Response Get Fire Severity Result Fire Recovery Result Analyze Fire Severity  Fire Event Name   Job Id  Get

get.description: Get the result of the fire boundary refinement.

schema.title: Response Get Refine Result Fire Recovery Result Refine  Fire Event Name   Job Id  Get

get.description:
Get the result of the vegetation map resolution against fire severity.
Use query parameter: ?severity_breaks=0.1&severity_breaks=0.2&severity_breaks=0.3

schema.title: Response Get Veg Map Result Fire Recovery Result Resolve Against Veg Map  Fire Event Name   Job Id  Get

post.description:
Upload GeoJSON data for a fire event.

Args:
    request: GeoJSON upload request (includes geojson and boundary_type)

Upload a zipped shapefile for a fire event.

Args:
    fire_event_name: Name of the fire event
    shapefile: Zipped shapefile upload
    boundary_type: Type of boundary - either "coarse" or "refined" (default: "refined")
